title: Saleh BBQ Tonight
details: We are dedicated in bringing you tasteful Indian dishes that you will absolutely love.

title: Bokaap kombuis
details: Bo-Kaap Kombuis is an authentic Cape Malay Restaurant that embodies the culture, beauty and uniqueness of the area.

title: Biesmiellah Restaurant
details: Biesmiellah has been serving the local Cape Muslim community and, increasingly, tourists for 40 years. Halaal Certified.

title: Food inn
details: Curries, often in wraps and bread bowls, served in simple fast food-style restaurant and takeaway.
